flavorText: Both part of the Legacy and an individual in his own right, the silver golem Karn is haunted by a single, terrible incident: while serving to protect the young Gerrard, Karn accidentally took the life of another. Wakened from years spent as a statue, the golem has vowed to never kill again as he rejoins Gerrard.
name: Karn
originalText: Each of your noncreature artifacts is also an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its total casting cost.
text: Each noncreature artifact you control is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value.
